body.name: Women's Classic Comfort Leather Loafers Cute Slip-Ons Casual Dress Shoes Lightweight Walking Flats Everyday Work Shoes
features: 【WELL CRAFTED FOR COMFORT!】: The upper is distinguished by full grain leather which is soft, supple, pliable, and the cute tumbled leather stretches to fit your foot. & Very soft interior to wear with bare feet. & Cushioned, supportive and breathable memory foam, came with removable insoles instead of ones that are glued from heel to toe. & Lightweight and shock absorbing PU outsole, gripping sole with an added grooved surface would be a nice addition. High quality and built to last.

【TRADITIONAL CRAFTSMANSHIP】: The exquisite contrast stitching helps to accentuate the shape, and make the shoe look more slender in the front. The gold waxed threads by skilled craftsman are well stitched to add a cute, attractive and stylish look to a classic style. Modern but retro! & The leather was reinforced to the sole with gold waxed threads not just glued. Attractive yet substantial.

【SLIDE ON COMFORT】: There is a tab on the top that you can unhook to insert your foot. The cute strap with the elastic piece that stretches over the decorative clasp. And its discreet elastic gores allow you to easily slide your foot in without hurting thumbs or toes. Plenty of room in the toe box. Not just for loafers, they are easy to slide on for a quick errand or for a lengthier walk. These are extremely comfortable almost like wearing slippers. No break-in period, so easy on and off.

【BOOT STYLING WITH LOAFER EASE】: It looks like an ankle boot but slips on like a loafer, without the extra leather confining your ankles. Casual yet dressy, and can be dressed up or down. The shoe looks great with jeans, but still goes well with dresses, slacks, pants, shorts, skirts, leggings and suits. Attractive alternative to clunky athletic shoes or sneakers, for walking, standing, working, travelling, teaching, nursing, driving, housekeeping and flight attendant. Comfy and Sharp!
【TRUE TO SIZE】: A nice casual shoe with great fit like a glove. Runs true to size for most standard US size in medium width. A life saver for all day wear.
body.description: Women's Classic Comfort Leather Loafers Cute Slip-On Casual Dress Shoes Lightweight Walking Flats Everyday Work Shoes LAZYPOP Comfort Loafers for Women LAZYPOP is an footwear brand inspired by the stylish and casual women lifestyles. Made from supple, pliable and stretchy leather and ultra lightweight polyurethane soles providing shock-absorbent, support and unparalleled comfort. The cute strap with decorative clasp as well as the contrasting stitching forms a timeless classic style that can be dressed up or down, appropriate to worn with everything from jeans to suits. The unique design makes it boot styling, yet slips on with the loafer ease. Supple, Pliable and Stretchy Leather Ultra Lightweight Polyurethane Soles Shock-Absorbent, Support and Unparalleled Comfort Cute Strap with Decorative Clasp Can Be Dressed Up or Down Boot Styling, Yet Have The Loafer Ease

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #11,452 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #41 in Women's Loafers & Slip-Ons

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The LAZYPOP loafer is a slip-on shoe that is popular with women as a stylish and casual option. Using a modern vision of craftsmanship to construct the shoes with pliable leather and super light PU sole, the loafers are not only stylish and comfortable, but also durable and long-lasting. They are a versatile choice from the casual weekend look to the boardroom. Slip-On Shoe for Women A Stylish and Casual Option Modern Vision of Craftsmanship Durable and Long-lasting Women's Classic Comfort Leather Loafers Cute Slip-On Casual Dress Shoes Lightweight Walking Flats Everyday Work Shoes LAZYPOP Comfort Loafers for Women LAZYPOP is an footwear brand inspired by the stylish and casual women lifestyles. Made from supple, pliable and stretchy leather and ultra lightweight polyurethane soles providing shock-absorbent, support and unparalleled comfort. The cute strap with decorative clasp as well as the contrasting stitching forms a timeless classic style that can be dressed up or down, appropriate to worn with everything from jeans to suits. The unique design makes it boot styling, yet slips on with the loafer ease. Supple, Pliable and Stretchy Leather Ultra Lightweight Polyurethane Soles Shock-Absorbent, Support and Unparalleled Comfort Cute Strap with Decorative Clasp Can Be Dressed Up or Down Boot Styling, Yet Have The Loafer Ease

Stretchy Tumbled Leather Upper The upper is distinguished by superior leather which is soft, supple and stretchy. Contrasting Threads They are well stitched by skilled craftsmen with golden waxed thread to add a cute, attractive and stylish look. Cute Strap with Decorative Clasp The cute strap over the instep connected by the elastic piece that stretches over the decorative button. Roomy Rounded Toes The shoes have ample room in the toe box, yet still give a look of dainty feet.

Discreet Elastic Gores A style that matches professional looks with slip-on ease because of the generous elastic gores on both sides of the shoes. Cushioned and Supportive Insole The resilient supportive memory foam provides plenty of cushion and takes the pressure off of the bump. Ultralight PU Outsole The PU out sole is reinforced by wax threads and the added grooved surface is a nice addition for the traction. Superior Arch Support Rigid arch support distributes and minimizes pressure in the foot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shoes look a lot like a pair of Clarks that I bought several years ago. Clarks quit making that particular shoe so I decided to try these. I bought size 10.5 and they fit great. I just got them today and have not worn them outside my home, but they are very comfortable so far. I think I will order another color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these shoes. They are super comfortable and I really like the style. Quality seems good for the price. Going to buy in another color! Amazon was recommending I buy and 8, but I got an 8.5 and they fit perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super lightweight and comfortable. They are not too tight but if you like to have extra room, you need to get the wider size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sadly I will return these
reviews.reviewText: I’m so disappointed. These shoes are cute! Great colors. Soft leather. Decent craftsmanship. But, I cannot get my foot into them. At least not with socks on. Barefoot yes! I live in the Northeast we need to wear socks. My foot measures 7.5. I usually wear 8 for width. Any larger and they would trip me. I bought the red and yellowish brown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! For me that's saying a lot
reviews.reviewText: I'm an older lady and have arthritic feet so finding shoes that are comfortable isn't easy. I'm going to a wedding this month and needed a shoe that would work (and that I can stand to wear) with a long dress. These arrived today & as soon as I put them on I knew they were going to be perfect. Very comfortable & lightweight exactly as described. The fit is right on too! I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute shoes, bad fit
reviews.reviewText: I have arch problems and other foot issues resulting from the arch problem. These shoes are so cute and I thought they might work. I was wrong. It was a bad fit which resulted in a painful sciatic "attack" that lasted a week. Maybe it would work for someone with no foot issues but wouldn't recommend for anyone with fallen arches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These shoes are a comfortable fit. The craftsmanship of these shoes can suit all shape feet...wide width, medium, ect. I had wore mines for over 12 hours and didn't want to take them off. Truly amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars WAY TOO SMALL!
reviews.reviewText: I wear a 9.5 shoe. I ordered a 9.5 shoe and the shoes fit like a child's shoe. Also, I received the shoes taped together and shrink wrapped with a label stuck to it. Terrible service, terrible product! So glad I sent them back for a refund!
